## Question 1(a)
```{r error=TRUE}
divide <- function(d,a) {
  if (a==0) stop("division by zero is undefined.")
  if (d<0 || a<0) stop("divide() only works for positive ‘a‘ and ‘d‘.")
  quotient <- 0
  for (i in 1:d) {
    if (d > a){
      d = d - a
      quotient = quotient + 1
    }
  }
  c(q = quotient, r = d)
}  
divide(22, 7)
22 %/% 7
22 %% 7
divide(22, 0)
divide(-22,7)
```

## Question 2(a)

```{r}

inv <- function(b, x0 = 10^-(ceiling(log10(abs(b)))), tol = sqrt(.Machine$double.eps), 
                message = FALSE) {
  dif <- 100
  while (dif > tol){
    y <- x0
    x0 <- x0 * (2 - b * x0) 
    dif <- x0 - y
    if (message) print(x0)
  }
  x0
}

inv(1000, message = TRUE)

```
